data.name: main_enc_forcestop_exit
data.value: Do you want to force stop the encoding and Exit the ShanaEncoder?

data.name: main_enc_forcestop
data.value: Do you want to force stop the encoding?

data.name: main_enc_stop
data.value: Do you want to stop the encoding?

data.name: main_help
data.value: How to: 1. Add files from menu 2. Click the settings or preset 3. Start

data.name: main_please_add_file
data.value: Please select list or add files.

data.name: main_preset_new_save
data.value:
The current settings have been changed by the user. Do you want to save the changed settings to the 'User Preset' and add the file to the 'User Preset'?
If Click the 'Yes' button, Save the current settings and open the 'User Preset'. If Click the 'No' button, Disappears current settings and open the 'Selected Preset'.

data.name: main_preset_new_save_fail
data.value: Selected preset file not found. Therefore current setting is saved to User Preset and added from the User Preset.

data.name: main_set_chg_now
data.value: Do you want to change the settings to current settings?

data.name: main_set_copy
data.value: The settings have been copied to a preset folder.

data.name: main_set_fail_copy
data.value: Failed to copy to a preset folder.

data.name: edit_audiobit_chg
data.value: Now, audio bit rate value do not exist from registered audio bit rate combobox. It may occur encoding error. Fix settings correctly?

data.name: edit_audiosample_chg
data.value: Now, audio sample rate value do not exist from registered audio sample rate combobox. It may occur encoding error. Fix settings correctly?

data.name: edit_cc_caution
data.value: Speeding settings and Closed Caption settings use at the same time. It may occur Closed Caption sync problem. Not recommended to use a Speeding setting or Closed Caption.

data.name: edit_cc_sn
data.value: Cannot set due to use of Closed Caption.

data.name: edit_need_abit
data.value: This audio codec need audio bit rate. Audio bit rate is set to 128.

data.name: edit_need_asample
data.value: This audio codec or audio mode needs audio sample rate. Used to automatically.

data.name: edit_pass2_caution
data.value: This codec is not able to setting automatic proper 2 Pass bit rate. Lower bit rate may occur error.

data.name: edit_samplechk
data.value: Set the sample rate cannot be used. Select the proper sample rate automatically.

data.name: edit_setsar_chg
data.value: SAR(Sample aspect ratio) is not 1/1. If not set 1/1, aspect ratio may cause problems. Modify to 1/1?

data.name: edit_vorbis_mono
data.value: libvorbis and 1ch settings is limited to 224 bit rate. Therefore set to 224 automatically.

data.name: edit_yadif
data.value: You have selected the Yadif Deinterlace. Yadif is located at the top of filters order.

data.name: edit_yadif_double
data.value: You have selected the double frame rate. Please select frame rate of double.

data.name: openfrm_fileaddlabel
data.value: Information is extracted. While adding files to the list.

data.name: mainfrm_noticecheckBox
data.value: Do not show this message again

data.name: mainfrm_schecklabel
data.value: To apply the new settings in 'user' preset item, Press the right mouse button and click the 'Change to current settings' on the menu.

data.name: main_always_cur_set
data.value: Are you sure you want to always use the current settings?

data.name: main_input_file_not_found
data.value: The input file does not exist.

data.name: main_log_save_notice
data.value: The log is saved in settings\shanaencoder.log in the installed folder.

data.name: main_output_file_not_found
data.value: The output file does not exist or file is not found.

data.name: main_output_folder_not_found
data.value: The output directory does not exist.

data.name: main_preset_folder_not_found
data.value: The preset directory does not exist.

data.name: main_set_chg_fail
data.value: The list is already started the encoding.

data.name: main_set_chg_s_a
data.value: Changed the settings of all selected items.

data.name: main_tray_exit_move_notice
data.value: Go here, when you close the program.

data.name: editfrm_subtitlehlabel
data.value: If not using Closed Caption, Please enable 'Disable subtitle copy' in order to prevent encoding error.

data.name: editfrm_unsharplabel
data.value: Blur: less than 0, Sharpen: greater than 0 (Default: 0)

data.name: filterfrm_helplabel
data.value:
Audio/Video Filter Editor.
The effect is different on filter order and filters are applied from the top line.

data.name: filter_af_aresample
data.value: Set audio sample rate. Left value is a sample rate and right value is resampler. You can choose two resampler.(soxr or swr) Default is 44100:resampler=soxr

data.name: filter_vf_scale
data.value: Set scale(size of video) Width:Height:Resize filter If width or height value is -1, width or height is set automatically. In proportion to SAR or DAR

data.name: filter_vf_shanasubtitle
data.value: Subtitle overlay shanasubtitle=1 is enable / shanasubtitle=0 is disable. Support for ASS, SSA, SMI files.

data.name: logofrm_fadegroupBox
data.value: Fade in, out and set time(second) for logo overlay.

data.name: logofrm_logoilabel
data.value: If video codec is copy(Direct Stream Copy), the logo is disable. The logo is not visible in the preview.(encoding only) *Not save in the preset.

data.name: mainfrm_EncMethodToolStripMenuItem
data.value: If an output file already exists

data.name: mainfrm_trayToolStripMenuItem
data.value: Closing the main window to tray

data.name: segment_enderr
data.value: End time was not in a correct format.

data.name: segment_starterr
data.value: Start time was not in a correct format.

data.name: setdeffrm_deflabel
data.value: The selected item is set to default value.

data.name: shanamtfrm_mtlabel
data.value: threads (Default 0) thread_type (Default frame) async (Default 1, Do not edit or delete 'async')

data.name: subtitle_alignment
data.value: Set the position of the overlay. The alignment is equal to the keyboard number pad. You can enter from 1 to 9

data.name: subtitle_angle
data.value: Set the angle. You can enter from 0 to 359 Default is 0

data.name: subtitle_backcolour
data.value: Set the shadow color and transparency. (&&H Alpha Blue Green Red) order and hexadecimal value.

data.name: subtitle_bold
data.value: Set whether to use bold. -1 is enabled, 0 is disabled.

data.name: subtitle_borderstyle
data.value: Set the border style. 1 is Outline+Shadow, 3 is Opaque Box.

data.name: subtitle_encoding
data.value: Set the character encoding. Default is 1

data.name: subtitle_fontsize
data.value: Set the font size. The recommended setting range is 0~99

data.name: subtitle_italic
data.value: Set whether to use italic. -1 is enabled, 0 is disabled.

data.name: subtitle_marginl
data.value: Set the left margin. The recommended setting range is 0~1000

data.name: subtitle_marginr
data.value: Set the right margin. The recommended setting range is 0~1000

data.name: subtitle_marginv
data.value: Set the vertical margin. The recommended setting range is 0~1000

data.name: subtitle_name
data.value: Set the style. Default is Style: Default

data.name: subtitle_outline
data.value: Set the outline. The recommended setting range is 0.0~100.0

data.name: subtitle_outlinecolour
data.value: Set the outline color and transparency. (&&H Alpha Blue Green Red) order and hexadecimal value.

data.name: subtitle_primarycolour
data.value: Set the primary color and transparency. (&&H Alpha Blue Green Red) order and hexadecimal value.

data.name: subtitle_scalex
data.value: Set the X-axis scale.(Unit: %) Default is 100

data.name: subtitle_scaley
data.value: Set the Y-axis scale.(Unit: %) Default is 100

data.name: subtitle_secondarycolour
data.value: Set the secondary color and transparency. (&&H Alpha Blue Green Red) order and hexadecimal value.

data.name: subtitle_shadow
data.value: Set the shadow. The recommended setting range is 0.0~100.0

data.name: subtitle_strikeout
data.value: Set whether to use strikeout. -1 is enabled, 0 is disabled.

data.name: subtitle_underline
data.value: Set whether to use underline. -1 is enabled, 0 is disabled.

data.name: edit_anafilterlabel
data.value: Not available. Because audio codec is none or copy. The preview is applied but the encoding is not applied.

data.name: edit_anvncopylabel
data.value: Copy is Direct Stream Copy. The copy mode is may occur error depending on the file. None is not encoding video or audio. The preview is applied but the encoding is not applied.

data.name: editfrm_recheckBox
data.value: Encoding speed limit to the input frame rate(1.0x) and Realtime encoding

data.name: edit_relimit
data.value: If use this feature, encoding speed is limited to below 1x. Fast encoding is not possible.

data.name: aboutfrm_alltext
data.value:
ShanaEncoder
This program is possible to install in individual/company/school/government anywhere and use freely. Copyright © 2008-2015 LEE KIWON License: Freeware
Program Developer: LEE KIWON(Shana) - http://shana.pe.kr Icon Maker - ver 2.x: KIM MINTAE(Iriya) - http://iriyasviel.tistory.com - ver 1.x: N.S.H. - http://kiraraenc.tistory.com

data.name: main_pm_save2
data.value: Are you sure you want to save this preset?

data.name: main_pm_user
data.value: Do you want to save to the 'User Preset'?

data.name: mainfrm_save_msg
data.value: When ShanaEncoder removed, copied preset files from the installation are deleted. Recommend that you save with a different filename. This message appears only once.

data.name: filter_vf_yadif
data.value: Set yadif (mode:parity:deint) If mode value is 1 or 3, set to double frame rate. parity 0=Top field first, 1=Bottom field first, -1=Auto deint 0=All, 1=Interlaced

data.name: segmentfrm_crophlabel
data.value: Enter here the value of crop. (Recommended when playing.)

data.name: segment_valuemsg
data.value: Enter a value in this way 1920:1072:0:4

data.name: segmentfrm_autocropdetectcheckBox
data.value: Enable cropdetect filter (Uncheck if slow computer)

data.name: segmentfrm_infolabel
data.value: Press the play/pause button to play the file.

data.name: shanaffplayfrm_error
data.value:
The ShanaFFplay has been terminated.
When playback ends before: Cannot be played due to invalid parameter or file in use by another process.

data.name: shanaffplayfrm_help
data.value:
To view this help, press the F1 key.
-------------------------
ShanaFFplay Shortcuts
Esc, Q Quit.
Space Play/Pause.
S Step to next frame.
W Show audio waves.
[, ] Speeding.
Left, Right Seek.
Down, Up, Mouse wheel Volume.
Mouse click Seek to percentage in file corresponding to fraction of width.
Alt + PrtSc Screen copy to clipboard.
-------------------------
Description of text on bottom
00:00:00.00 Play time. *Depending on filter settings, this part might not be displayed correctly.
1.0x Speeding.
A-V: 0.000 Difference between audio and video in sync. *Depending on filter settings, this part might not be displayed correctly.
vol=128(100%) Volume. *0~128, Expressed as a percentage in parentheses.
type=? Frame type. *Depending on filter settings, this part might not be displayed correctly.
keyframe=0 Key frame. If this value is 1, frame is a key frame. *Depending on filter settings, this part might not be displayed correctly.
fd=0 Frame drop. *Pass without showing a frame.

data.name: shanaffplay_welcome
data.value: Welcome to ShanaFFplay. To view shortcuts help, press the F1 key.

data.name: editfrm_movsubsellabel
data.value: To use the Closed Caption, Please select the file format to 3gp, 3g2, mp4, mov.

data.name: x264optsfrm_GOPlabel
data.value: If you are using GOP size, Disable Keyframe to Quick settings.

data.name: main_x264paramupdate
data.value: x264 settings have been changed automatically. profile and tune parameter is changed to none from Null. level parameter is changed to auto from Auto. Please check the settings and save the changes.

data.name: editfrm_targetcheckBox
data.value: Set video bit rate based on file size

data.name: shanafontfrm_add
data.value: You can not add any more.

data.name: main_noitemsel
data.value: No items selected in the encoding list.

data.name: edit_fdkhev2aacchk
data.value: You must select stereo channel in HE-AACv2.
